pages.text: 26|4|ennal ‍nam uddesikkunna paksam avarute mel akasatt ninn nam oru drstantam irakkikeatukkunnatan anneram avarute piratikal atinn kileatunnunnatayittirukayum ceyyum
26|5|paramakarunikanre pakkal ‍ninn etearu putiya ulbeadhanam vannettumpealum avar atilninn tirinnukalayunnavarakatirunnittilla
26|6|annane avar nisedhiccu talliyirikkayan atinal avar eteannine parihasikkunnavarayirikkunnuvea atinepparriyulla vrttantannal avarkk vannettikkeallum
26|7|bhumiyilekk avar neakkiyille? ella mikacca sasyavargannalilninnum etrayan nam atil ‍mulappiccirikkunnat‌
26|10|ninre raksitav musaye viliccu keant iprakaram paranna sandarbham (srad'dheyamatre,) ni a akramikalaya janannalute atuttekk celluka
26|11|atayat‌, phir'aunre janatayute atukkalekk avar suksmata palikkunnille? (ennu ceadikkuka)
26|12|addeham parannu: enre raksitave, avar enne nisedhiccu tallumenn tirccayayum nan bhayappetunnu
26|13|enre hrdayam nerunnippeakum enre navin olukkuntavukayilla atinal ‍harunn kuti ni sandesam ayakkename
26|14|avarkk enre peril oru kurram areapikkanumunt atinal avar enne keannekkumenn nan bhayappetunnu
26|15|allahu parannu: orikkalumilla, nam'mute drstantannalum keant ninnal iruvarum peayikkealluka tirccayayum ninnaleateappam nam srad'dhiccu kelkkunnunt‌
26|16|ennitt ninnal phir'aunre atukkalcenn iprakaram parayuka: tirccayayum nannal leakaraksitavinkalninn niyeagikkappetta dutanmarakunnu
26|18|avan (phir'aun) parannu: kuttiyayirunnappeal nannalute kuttattil ‍ninne nannal valarttiyille? ninre ayus'sil ‍kure keallannal nannalute itayil ‍ni kaliccukuttiyittumunt‌
26|19|ni ceyta ninre a(dus‌) pravrtti ni ceyyukayumuntayi. ni nandikettavarute kuttattiltanneyakunnu
